select CONCAT(c.org_parent_id) orgParentId, CONCAT(b.org_id) orgId, IFNULL(d.name,'') orgName, e.name as codeName, c.code_id as codeId, c.type_id as typeId, f.name as ourName, f.not_use as notUse, f.phone_one as PhoneOne, g.name as maintenanceName, h.time_start as timeStart, h.time_stop as timeStop, g.is_enable as isEnable from pdf_code_user_org b left join pdf_maintenance_code c on b.code_id = c.code_id and b.type_id =c.type_id LEFT JOIN t_org d on b.org_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_code e on b.code_id = e.id and b.type_id = e.type_id LEFT JOIN pdf_user f on b.user_id = f.id left join pdf_maintenance g on c.maintenance_id = g.id left join pdf_maintenance_detail h on c.main_detail_id = h.id
b.org_id =c.org_id and b.order_no =1 and c.order_no = 1
AND (d.id = #{orgId} or d.parent_ids like concat('%',#{orgId},'%'))
AND c.code_id = #{codeId} and c.type_id = #{typeId}
AND f.name like concat('%',#{ourName},'%')
AND g.name like concat('%',#{maintenanceName},'%')
and h.time_start >=concat(#{timeStart})
and h.time_stop <= concat(#{timeStop},'23:59:59')
order by h.time_start

SELECT concat(a.id) as id, b.name as name ,a.order_no as orderNo,c.name as positionName, b.phone_one as phoneOne,b.phone_two as phoneTwo, o.name departOrgId, b.not_use as notUse,b.remarks as remarks from pdf_code_user_org a inner join pdf_user b on a.user_id = b.id INNER JOIN pdf_position c on c.id = b.position_id left join pdf_elec_org o on o.id = b.depart_org_id where a.code_id =#{codeId} and a.type_id = #{typeId} and a.org_id =#{orgId} order BY a.order_no
